picked_headlines.summary: SNNDeep outperforms in liver disease diagnosis using CT imaging, showcasing AI's medical potential.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: The article highlights a significant application of AI in healthcare, showcasing a practical use case with potential real-world impact.

picked_headlines.summary: Generative model enhances real-time text summarization in web search, outperforming traditional methods.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This article presents a breakthrough in web search technology, relevant to both technical audiences and stakeholders interested in product innovation.

picked_headlines.summary: SwizzlePerf optimizes GPU kernel performance with hardware-aware LLMs, improving efficiency.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: The article addresses engineering challenges, offering insights into performance optimization, crucial for technical and managerial audiences.

picked_headlines.summary: ChatThero uses LLMs for addiction recovery, integrating CBT and MI for effective support.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This article demonstrates the integration of AI in mental health support, appealing to stakeholders focused on healthcare innovation.

digest:
- *CogVLA* enhances Vision-Language-Action models with efficient routing and sparsification, achieving state-of-the-art results with lower costs. [Link](https://huggingface.co/papers/2508.21046)
- *EASI-RAG* is an agile method for deploying RAG tools in SMEs, enhancing implementation speed and user adoption in industrial settings. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.21024)
- *AI Agentic Vulnerability Injection* presents a novel AI framework for generating realistic vulnerabilities in code to improve automated detection systems. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.20866)
- *MIDAS* introduces a real-time autoregressive video generation framework for interactive digital humans, enhancing multimodal control and efficiency. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.19320)
- *CAMB* introduces a benchmark for evaluating LLMs in civil aviation maintenance, addressing gaps in domain knowledge and reasoning capabilities. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.20420)
- *Veritas* introduces a novel deepfake detector using pattern-aware reasoning and a new dataset, HydraFake, addressing real-world challenges. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.21048)
- *AI-SearchPlanner* enhances search efficiency by decoupling planning and QA tasks using RL, outperforming existing models in effectiveness and efficiency. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.20368)
- *MPFormer* enhances industrial recommendation systems by addressing multi-objective optimization misalignment with innovative Transformer mechanisms. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.20400)
- *IntentionReasoner* enhances LLM safety by using intent reasoning and query refinement, balancing safety and utility effectively. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.20151)
- *Improving Quantization* with post-training model expansion can enhance model quality in quantization without retraining, offering a new approach to optimize LLMs. [Link](https://arxiv.org/abs/2503.17513)
